properties.Name: EPA
properties.Description: Environmental Protection Agency - Bright Rain provides development and consultation services to the EPA in support of mapping the results of the Clean Watersheeds Needs Survey (CWNS). Services include the development of a custom web mapping application in conjunction with an application developed and hosted within the EPA GeoPlatform.

properties.Name: City of Seattle
properties.Description: Development of two web map applications using ArcGIS Server JavaScript API. A Construction Coordination map application designed to provide the public information about planned construction projects and events within the City, a Parking Locator map application designed to provide real-time information regarding parking options for the public within the City.

properties.Name: Seattle City Light
properties.Description: Development of real estate property management mapping application.

properties.Name: Colorado State Parks
properties.Description: Instrumental in completing a comprehensive survey study. Roles included mapping visitor distribution, data collection, data analysis and reporting. The results of which led to the publication of Colorado State Park's 1998 Visitation Study Report. Trail Use Distribution Study at Castlewood Canyon State Park using ArcView 3.2.

properties.Name: ERD
properties.Description: The Episcopal Relief & Development Monitoring and Evaluation Program Management System is a web based map application that supports aid programs from project budgeting to monitoring the progress of program efforts through final evaluation of the effectiveness of program and project activities.

properties.Name: Antares Group
properties.Description: Map interface development of a web based contract management tool that facilitates the management of contractual obligations between crop producers and biomass processors. The front end technology uses the Leaflet mapping JavaScript library to present the user with an aerial base map along with a tile layer created with TileMill and hosted with MapBox that shows critical areas and labels. The user can interact with fields, storage and access locations managed as vector graphics as well as enter and search associated tabular data. The interface interacts with a backend api exposed via the ASP.Net MVC framework.

properties.Name: BLM
properties.Description: Development of a web based transportation modeling application used for transportation planning for BLM and USFS. Subcontractor to Logan Simpson Design

properties.Name: Midway Sewer District
properties.Description: Provide GIS and asset management support and develop and maintain data maintenance applications

properties.Name: Valley View Sewer District
properties.Description: Provide GIS and asset management support and develop and maintain data maintenance applications
